articles.title: JPMorgan says Tesla owes the bank $162 million
articles.description: JPMorgan has sued Tesla, and claims it’s owed $162 million after Tesla refused to fully settle a 2014 stock warrant agreement. The dispute centers on changes made to the agreement following Tesla CEO Elon Musk’s infamous 2018 “funding secured” tweet.
